com.lars_albrecht.foldergen.plugin.interfaces

Interface IFolderGenPlugin

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FolderGenPlugin

    public interface IFolderGenPlugin
    Version:
    1.0.1.0
    Author:
    lalbrecht

      Creats a folder.

      • INFO_FILEMARKER

        static final java.lang.Integer INFO_FILEMARKER
        Marker for the plugin in the foldergenconf (e.g.: "+", "-" [...]).

      • INFO_INFOMARKER

        static final java.lang.Integer INFO_INFOMARKER
        Internal marker. Defines in a single word the function.

      • INFO_CONTENTSTARTMARKER

        static final java.lang.Integer INFO_CONTENTSTARTMARKER
        In contentplugins, this is the start of file.

      • INFO_CONTENTENDMARKER

        static final java.lang.Integer INFO_CONTENTENDMARKER
        In contentplugins, this is the end of file.

      • INFO_CONTENTREPLACE

        static final java.lang.Integer INFO_CONTENTREPLACE
        If the content will be replaced in plugintype PLUGINTYPE_CONFEXTENSION_CONTENT.

      • INFO_ADDITIONALKEYS

        static final java.lang.Integer INFO_ADDITIONALKEYS
        Semikolon seperated list of additional keys

      • BASICINFO_FILETITLE

        static final java.lang.Integer BASICINFO_FILETITLE
        The filetitle. Can be more than a title, but usually this is only the title.

      • BASICINFO_FILEMARKER

        static final java.lang.Integer BASICINFO_FILEMARKER
        The filemarker. e.g.: +

    • Method Detail

      • doWork

        java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> doWork(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> workerMap)
        CONFEXTENSION: You only need to return null. You became a HashMap with "additionalData" (HashMap), "rootFolder" (File), "name" (String) and "chain" (ArrayList)
        CONTENTEXTENSION: you need to return a HashMap with key "content" and became a HashMap with "content".
        Parameters:
        workerMap -
        Returns:
        HashMap

      • getAdditionlInfo

        java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getAdditionlInfo(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.String> basicInfo)
        Returns additional info if return not null. basicInfo is a HashMap. It contains the BASICINFO_* statics.
        Parameters:
        basicInfo -
        Returns:
        HashMap

      • replaceContent

        java.lang.String replaceContent(java.lang.String content)
        Replaces the content for CONTENTEXTENSION-Plugins.
        Parameters:
        content -
        Returns:
        String

      • getItemTitle

        java.lang.String getItemTitle(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.String> basicInfo)
        Returns the title for the item in file. In basic plugins you return basicInfo.get(IFolderGenPlugin.BASICINFO_FILETITLE).trim();
        Parameters:
        basicInfo -
        Returns:
        String

      • getPluginType

        java.lang.Integer getPluginType()
        Returns the plugin type. This is necessaray to load the plugin. You need to return one of the PLUGINTYPE... statics.
        Returns:
        Integer
